scripts.compile: uv run ruff check --fix && uv run ruff check && uv run mypy src --pretty
scripts.gradio: KAIRIX_MOCK_INFERENCE=1 uv run gradio src/kairix_offline/ui/mem_ui.py --demo-name history_importer
scripts.clear-entities: echo "MATCH (n:$ENTITY_TYPE) DETACH DELETE n" | cypher-shell -a bolt://localhost:7687 -u neo4j -p password
scripts.clear-source-documents: echo "MATCH (n:SourceDocument) DETACH DELETE n" | cypher-shell -a bolt://localhost:7687 -u neo4j -p password
scripts.clear-agents: echo "MATCH (n:Agent) DETACH DELETE n" | cypher-shell -a bolt://localhost:7687 -u neo4j -p password
scripts.clear-memory-shards: echo "MATCH (n:MemoryShard) DETACH DELETE n" | cypher-shell -a bolt://localhost:7687 -u neo4j -p password
scripts.clear-summaries: echo "MATCH (n:Summary) DETACH DELETE n" | cypher-shell -a bolt://localhost:7687 -u neo4j -p password
scripts.clear-embeddings: echo "MATCH (n:Embedding) DETACH DELETE n" | cypher-shell -a bolt://localhost:7687 -u neo4j -p password
